Name: Menehune Juice
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Prepare garnish of lime wedge, mint sprigs & stirrer (preferably a Menehune stirrer).
Garnish with lime wedge, mint sprigs bouquet and stirrer.
Review: Slightly sweet and strong. According to Vic, " One sip and you may see a Menehune. "
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron's 1947-72 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Menehune Juice contains 212 calories
